Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link

Interface LinkService

All Superinterfaces:
ButtonService, TableInsertion
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinkServiceImpl
public interface LinkService extends ButtonService
Provides service-level methods for interacting with link UI components.

This interface defines operations for performing actions on links, such as clicking and double-clicking, while delegating the actual interactions to specific implementations based on the configured LinkComponentType.

Author:

    • doubleClick

      default void doubleClick(SmartWebElement container, String linkText)
      Double-clicks a link with the specified text inside a container, using the default link component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container that contains the link.
      linkText - The text of the link to click.
